party@grandstand.title: Party Room
party@grandstand.description:
Champagne? Mead? Cider?  All have taps on the wall.  If you
only care if your bet wins, then have blast...

betting@grandstand.title: The Parimutuel Betting Window
betting@grandstand.description:
Old form sheets plaster the walls.  A polished but nicked
oak wall has a grilled opening behind which stands the Bookie.
A sign pasted over the grille reads 
          UNDER CONSTRUCTION
       if you want to place a bet
           tell a power

grandstand@grandstand.title: The Grandstand
grandstand@grandstand.description:
The flags are flying; the bleachers are loaded.  The Sportscaster
has its microphone ready.  The Tourney!  Promised Land pauses --
who will win?
MORTALS: note that in this specific location you can do the following:
where (with whatzone)
eq <player>
spec <player>
score <player>
knowledge <player>
snoop <contestant>
user   -- will show what immortals usually see

bookie@grandstand.name: bookie
bookie@grandstand.description: A tall, lean elf stands behind the grilled window.

sportscaster@grandstand.name: sportscaster
sportscaster@grandstand.description: The fangs on the Sportscaster suggest it's just &+Rblood&+g that he likes.
